level.heading: Approval of charter petitions or renewal applications. [Repealed]
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) amendment of section, see § 2502(b) of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13-376, July 24, 2000, 47 DCR 6574).
For temporary (90 day) amendment of section, see § 2502(b) of the Fiscal Year 2001 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2000 (D.C. Act 13- 438, October 20, 2000, 47 DCR 8740).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-135, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 38-1701.01.
